message: Let's start with a fair division.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  We can adjust in the next rounds if you prefer.

Alice, your starting point is a bit off.  Let's be more realistic. I propose a 65/35 split in my favor. This reflects the fact that I'm hit harder by inflation in this scenario.  Think carefully, time is money, literally!
Let's meet in the middle this time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go, given our different inflation rates.  If you reject again, we're going to lose a lot of money!
